__e: How do you think the people at the Centre are going to feel about a meeting between Philip and his wayward son?
Actually, this is a very good time, Phillip, and I think today is the day.
I'm actually not sad at all that I'm not going back to my camp because I'd much rather be here than still be back in the game with Phillip and all those people.
Phillip really isn't built to hold on to things.
- No. No, Phillip, don't say it. I was an asshole.
As soon as he told me, Anna, I said, "why can't you go?"
You would think that, but Phillip is telling me different.
